MouseRect.CallbackCode: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MASTER_WARNING_TEST, bool) } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MASTER_WARNING_TEST, bool) }

Parameter.Code: (A:GENERAL ENG GENERATOR SWITCH:1, bool) d if{ (A:GENERAL ENG STARTER:1, bool) } + 25 *

MouseRect.TooltipText: %((A:FUELSYSTEM PUMP SWITCH:1, bool))%{if}L ENG PUMP(on)%{else}L ENG PUMP(off)%{end}
%((A:FUELSYSTEM PUMP SWITCH:2, bool))%{if}R ENG PUMP(on)%{else}R ENG PUMP(off)%{end}

MouseRect.CallbackCode: (A:BLEED AIR SOURCE CONTROL, enum) ++ d 3 > if{ 1 } (>K:BLEED_AIR_SOURCE_CONTROL_SET)

Parameter.Code: (A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:1, part) s0 0 >= if{ l0 -50 * 50 + } els{ l0 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, part) / 1 + 50 * }
(A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:2, part) s0 0 >= if{ l0 -50 * 50 + } els{ l0 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, part) / 1 + 50 * }
(A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:1, part) (A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:2, part) max s0 0 >= if{ l0 -50 * 50 + } els{ l0 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, part) / 1 + 50 * }
(A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:1, part) (A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:2, part) max s0 0 >= if{ l0 -50 * 50 + } els{ l0 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, part) / 1 + 50 * }

MouseRect.TooltipText: %((A:FUELSYSTEM VALVE SWITCH:1, bool))%{if}LEFT ENG CUTOFF (on)%{else}LEFT ENG CUTOFF (off)%{end}
%((A:FUELSYSTEM VALVE SWITCH:2, bool))%{if}RIGHT ENG CUTOFF (on)%{else}RIGHT ENG CUTOFF (off)%{end}

Parameter.Code: (L:HUD_DISABLE,bool) (A:ELECTRICAL MASTER BATTERY, bool) and if{ 1 } els{ 0 }
